summary: NullReferenceException triggered after completing timing minigames
description: A NullReferenceException appears on screen immediately after successfully completing a timing minigame. This occurs consistently across multiple planets.
steps: 1. Launch the game and progress to any timing minigame (e.g., Region 3).
3. Observe the screen immediately after the minigame closes.
expected: Minigame closes cleanly, and gameplay returns to the previous context or advances to the next state without errors.
actual: A NullReferenceException: 'Object reference not set to an instance of an object' appears on screen.
